    • addConfirmationListenerToButton

      Adds a confirmation listener to a button.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to add the listener to.
      actionCommand - The action command for the button.
      account - The account associated with the button.
      accountStatusLabel - The label to display the account status.
      accountBalanceLabel - The label to display the account balance.
      accountTypeLabel - The label to display the account type.
      accountIDLabel - The label to display the account ID.
      accountUsernameLabel - The label to display the account username.
